name: Christmas Game (Braindeer Games)
description:
It's Christmas time and you're the only one who can put those gifts under the tree, you happy spreader of good christmas cheer! Those bags full of presents sure are heavy though, gotta drop em if you want to move any quicker. You'll be scored by how many gifts are under the tree by the time you're done. :)

Controls

  • Arrow Keys, WASD, Control Stick : Move
  • Z, K, A : Interact
  • X, L, B : Run
